bio: I have purchased a lot of music NFTs on the soundxyz platform using the OP network. i love music nft . i from Camel ventures <3
contributionDescription:
That's great to hear! I have been following and contributing to artists on soundxyz along with Camel Ventures. Camel Ventures is Top 1 viral on soundxyz ( 15-8-2023 )
I have purchased 155 music NFTs from 33 artists, with a special focus on ROHKI NFTs through Camel Ventures' referral link. I started buying NFTs with ETH on the OP network and ETH main from 29-3 -2023. I'm very happy to contribute to OP and soundxyz. I also tweet and share mint music nft in my twitter.

contributionLinks.description: V Buterin music nft minted - my first nft minted eth OP network
Proof photo camel ventures was top1 viral on soundxyz

impactDescription: I bought 155 tracks from 33 artists, maybe not a lot but I thought I would contribute a little to the OP network and soundxyz. Why did I buy so much?  in the bear market, most people are scared and hold money , but I took the risk to buy music nft using op network. I want to be a little ant building on OP spirit, I don't know if I can get anything? But I believe OP, because OP's spirit is to move forward together, not ARB)) . Below is my address, you can check it . .
